tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerDemographics (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(20),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerDemographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE SegmentTargeting (
    targeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES CustomerSegments(segment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerDemographics(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(50),
    marital_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR,
  last_name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  city VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE segment_loyal_customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  loyalty_points INT,
  membership_status VARCHAR,
  last_purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE segment_new_customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  signup_date DATE,
  first_purchase_date DATE,
  marketing_channel VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE segment_high_income_customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  income INT,
  occupation VARCHAR,
  city VARCHAR,
  preferred_brand VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE segment_offline_shoppers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  last_visit_date DATE,
  purchase_frequency VARCHAR,
  store_location VARCHAR,
  average_purchase_amount DECIMAL
)
